title: C++快捷
content:
{

​    "ACM-model": {

​       "prefix": "acm",

​       "body": [

​        "#include <bits/stdc++.h>",

​        "",

​        "using namespace std;",

​        "using ll = long long;",

​        "using PII = pair<int,int>;",

​        "",

​        "#define mp make_pair",

​        "#define pb push_back",

​        "",

​        "#define all(x)   x.begin(),x.end()",

​        "#define sz(x)    int(x.size())",

​        "#define endl     '\\n'",

​        "",

​        "mt19937 rnd((int)std::chrono::steady_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count());",

​        "const int MOD = 1e9+7;",

​        "",

​        "void solve(){\n\t$0", 

​           "}\n",

​        "\nint main() {",

​        "\tios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);",

​        "\tcin.tie(nullptr);",

​        "\tcout.tie(nullptr);",

​        "#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE",

​        "\tfreopen(\"../Standard/in.dat\",\"r\",stdin);",

​        "\tfreopen(\"../Standard/out.dat\",\"w\",stdout);",

​        "#endif",

​        "\tint T = 1; $1cin >> T;",

​        "\twhile (T--)  solve();",

​        "\treturn 0;",

​        "}"

​     ],

​     "description": "init acm model"

   },

   "dir":{

​       "prefix": "dir9",

​       "body": [

​           "const int dir[9][2] = {{-1,-1},{-1,0},{-1,-1},{0,-1},{0,0},{0,1},{1,-1},{1,0},{1,1}};"

​       ]

   }

}
